html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-09092023-09-25FIN
ActProceeds of Crime (Money Laundering) and Terrorist Financing Act
SubjectRegulations Amending Certain Regulations Made Under the Proceeds of Crime (Money Laundering) and Terrorist Financing Act
PrecisRegulations Amending CERTAIN REGULATIONS MADE UNDER THE PROCEEDS OF CRIME (MONEY LAUNDERING) AND TERRORIST FINANCING ACT in order to (1) require entities that collect currency, money orders, traveller's cheques or other similar negotiable instruments for transport to meet certain obligations; (2) increase the amount of the administrative monetary penalties; (3) allow the Financial Transactions and Reports Analysis Centre of Canada to provide reporting entities administrative monetary penalties-related documents electronically through the secure system; (4) require money services businesses applicants to submit the telephone numbers and email addresses of their chief executive officer, president, directors and every person who owns or controls, directly or indirectly, 20% or more of the business and the number of the agents, mandataries and branches in each country; and (5) make technical amendments to the Regulations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2023-0193 Publication Date: 2023-10-11
AttachmentsAttachment
